metatags.twitter:title: What are the penalties for refusing to take a breathalyzer test in Virginia?
metatags.og:title: What are the penalties for refusing to take a breathalyzer test in Virginia?
metatags.og:description: Virginia drivers are required to submit to a breathalyzer test if they are charged with drunk driving. Learn about the possible penalties for refusal here.
